name: Unfinished Rabbit Game
description:
Unfinished Rabbit game 🐇

Follow the Blue rabbits, if you find a red one, you're dead.

---------------------------

This is our first submission for the Mini Jam edition 39: Monsters

The constraints were to make a roguelike with permadeath and generated content. 

We barely managed to achieve a minimal demo, so be easy with us and the result 🙈. . On this prototype, enemies are generated in a random position, and there is permadeath when an enemy hits you.

Party members:

- Dukio: Game director, game designer, ideas muse. All the background 🧙‍♂️

- Krrjuus: Graphics, animations, tilesets, tilemaps, rabbits. All the visual stuff 🎨  

- Adoankim: Code monkey 🐒
